title: Bloomberg Markets: Sassower, Wilson on Brazil, Markets
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Sassower, Wilson on Brazil, Markets
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Damian Sassower Fixed Income Strategist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the political crisis with Brazil's President Michel Temer and the impact on EM credit with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
